title: [Self-directed] Ecological Teaching Methodology Applied Clinical Psychology Training Course

context.additional_context: Ecological approach training applicable to the language domain for learners in administrator/leader roles

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three strategies for forming a therapeutic alliance between therapists and clients from an ecological perspective.
Learners will be able to develop intervention plans that consider environment-person interaction elements through real-case analysis.
Learners will be able to complete practical scenarios by applying self-organized learning processes under constraints.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
